com.loraiot.iot.service

类 CLIParser

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.loraiot.iot.service.CLIParser

  • public class CLIParser
extends java.lang.Object
    Parse the command line to send different message to CSIF, api interface is also in the class.
    版本:
    0.0.1
    作者:
    10028484

    • 方法详细资料

      • parseCmd

        public byte[] parseCmd(java.lang.String[] args)
                throws java.lang.Exception
        Method to parse the command input in console
        参数:
        args - The input command line arguments.
        返回:
        Byte array, the message byte array ready to put in socket.
        抛出:
        java.lang.Exception

      • getAppkeyBytes

        public static byte[] getAppkeyBytes(java.lang.String appkey)
                             throws java.io.UnsupportedEncodingException
        抛出:
        java.io.UnsupportedEncodingException

      • challenge

        public static java.lang.String challenge(java.lang.String content,
                                         java.lang.String appkey)
                                  throws java.io.UnsupportedEncodingException
        Method to use AES 128 to compose the challenge parameter in join message
        参数:
        content - The content to use AES128 to encipher
        password - The key to add on AES128 algorithm
        返回:
        The string enciphered in AES128
        抛出:
        java.io.UnsupportedEncodingException

      • composeHexMsg

        public static java.lang.String composeHexMsg(java.lang.String appeui,
                                             java.lang.String nonce)
        Transfer the incoming command line to standard hex message bytes[].
        参数:
        appeui - Appeui in messaage.
        nonce - Nonce in message.
        返回:
        The String has benn composed in HEX format

      • intToByteArray

        public static byte[] intToByteArray(int i)
        Method to transfer the int into byte array, which is used to compose the message head.
        参数:
        i - The int stands for the length of the message.
        返回:
        The byte array of the message header.

      • encodeBase64

        public static java.lang.String encodeBase64(byte[] input)
                                     throws java.lang.Exception
        Method to encode by Base64.
        参数:
        input - The input byte array to use BASE64 to transfer into the printable string.
        返回:
        The printable string in base64 coder.
        抛出:
        java.lang.Exception

      • decodeBase64

        public static byte[] decodeBase64(java.lang.String input)
                           throws java.lang.Exception
        Method to decode by Base64.
        参数:
        input - The input String to use BASE64 to transfer into the byte array.
        返回:
        The base 64 byte array.
        抛出:
        java.lang.Exception
